beginnings.scenario:
Fuck that was a bad landing. What's the opposite of auspicious? Shit?

Your peeps set up shop and soon a small settlement forms. Your main man INSERTNAMEHERE pulls you aside for a wee conversation. Word is it's about time this place had a name, and they share a few of the more popular ideas with you.

choices.outcome: I mean, it's a bit iffy but I guess it's kinda fitting.

events.scenario:
I am sweating.

I’m sweating too much, aren’t I? This must be the warmest cinema in the world.

Or is it cold? And this is a cold sweat? Don’t start shivering.

No one wants to touch someone who looks like they have the flu.

Bad enough I had the extra spicy tacos.

Okay.

Focus.

choices.choice: Go for the sneaky deodorant spray?
choices.outcome: Whole cinema is looking at me like a weirdo. She is so embarrassed.

choices.choice: Wipe my hands on my trousers?
choices.outcome: Nice, nice. Just a bit clammy. Trust the deodorant is holding.

events.scenario:
I need to pee.

I absolutely need to hold it in.

Whatever you do, don’t pee yourself on the first date.

Just wait until you get home to your nice clean bathroom where nobody can hear you go.

Concentrate on the movie.

Nope.

Not happening, time to go.

You’re a grown woman, just stand up and excuse yourself.

Why did I get the extra large slushy?

choices.choice: Hold in it five more minutes.
choices.outcome: God. That was the worst thing that has ever happened to anyone. I can’t believe I face planted. Why did I hold it so long?

choices.choice: Tell him you will be right back?
choices.outcome: Oh my god. I feel so much better.

events.scenario:
Okay, she’s back.

She hasn’t just gone home and left you sitting on your own like a loser.

Is she enjoying this? I have no idea what this film is about.

Is it good even? I didn’t pick it.

What if she asks me about it afterwards? Maybe I should google a review so that I can sound smart.

She knows everything, always doing these obscure pop culture references.

I love it when she does that.

choices.choice: Look up a review on my phone?
choices.outcome: Aww man, does she think I’m bored?

choices.choice: Turn it off and try to relax.
choices.outcome: She likes you. She told you. Be yourself. You got this.
